q: consultations avec les deux protagonistes. Ils disposeront d'un mois pour rendre leurs conclusions. Des conclusions qui toujours, selon le communiqu final, seront`` contraignantes'' tant pour Laurent Gbagbo que pour Alassane Ouattara . who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last February- admits he struggles to relate to very young kids, but would love to have youngsters of his own to play games with. He said: I worry about it- because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70...`` Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. I like them at that age when they can talk and understand. I'm not sure I could deal with the whole` ga ga goo' thing. But I genuinely like kids. singing competition TV show,`` X Factor,'' which doesn't hit the US airwaves until September. Simon Cowell stood as a larger-than-life statue with the words`` He's back'' dominating the screen. He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome.`` I'll never forget this day,'' an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play. Heisman winner Herschel Walker won by a technical knock out in the first round of his recent MMA fight. An artist in Sweden converted a three-ton block of ice into a giant statue of Jesus.

want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
